PaymentAggregator.mainSelect: select doc.cd_entita_fatt||'-'|| doc.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID --0 ,to_char(pay.gl_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), --1 TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), --2 doc.amount_due_original, --3 TO_CHAR(pay.due_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), --4 amount, --5 pay.cash_receipt_id, --6 pay.receipt_number, --7 doc.trx_date, doc.due_date, doc.document_status, doc.competence_date, doc.amount_due_original, doc.amount_due_remaining, pay.receipt_date, pay.status, pay.confirmed_flag, pay.amount_applied from dbi_user.wrk_oa_documents doc, dbi_user.wrk_oa_payments pay, account_vkp ca where ca.legacy = doc.cd_entita_fatt and doc.account_number = pay.account_number and doc.customer_trx_id = pay.customer_trx_id order by doc.account_number, doc.customer_trx_id

PaymentExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.LEGACY, --0 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.TIPO, --1 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.HERKF, --2 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.BLDAT, --3 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.BUDAT, --4 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.OIBEL, --5 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.AUGRD, --6 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.ZINCRID, --7 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.LEGACY, --8 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.TIPO, --9 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.BUKRS, --10 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.HKONT, --11 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.VALUT, --12 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.BETRW, --13 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.SGTXT --14 FROM EMIG_PAY_FKKKO, EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK WHERE EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.LEGACY=EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.LEGACY ORDER BY EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.LEGACY
